vertex_degree_sequence.name: Degree sequence
vertex_degree_sequence.description: Check if the graph has the given degree sequence (Comma separated. I.e. '3,3,2,2,1').

number_vertices_of_degree.name: Required vertices of given degree
number_vertices_of_degree.description: Checks if there are a given number of vertices in the graph with the given degree.

vertex_degree_at_most.name: Vertex degree at most
vertex_degree_at_most.description: Checks if all the vertices have at most the given degree.
